data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Sopište, North Macedonia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sopište, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Sopište, North Macedonia.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 599 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Sopište, North Macedonia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sopište, North Macedonia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, please remember the Albanian, Macedonian people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
There are 5,400 people living in the state of Sopište. Only about 9 might be believers.
Lord, please give the 9 believers in the state of Sopište the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sopište, North Macedonia has a population of 5,400.

We estimate Sopište has 9 people who might know Jesus, 3,337 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,053 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 599 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Sopište.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.
